hasDitaContent.@value: Tapentadol is predicted to increase the risk of serotonin syndrome when given with linezolid. Manufacturer advises caution.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Tapentadol   is predicted to   increase   the risk of serotonin syndrome when given with   linezolid .  Manufacturer advises caution .

hasDitaContent.@value: Terbutaline is predicted to increase the risk of elevated blood pressure when given with linezolid. Manufacturer advises avoid.
